Progress.rbmpGeneralProgress: Кратко описание на постигнатия напредък от втория ПУРБ, по-специално относно намаляването на постигнатия натиск и предприетите мерки

measuresFromSecondProgrammeReference.wfd:subject: Progress_measuresFromSecondProgrammeReference - Опишете с няколко думи предмета на предоставената справка (например методология или информация за основните мерки и т.н.)
measuresFromSecondProgrammeReference.wfd:documentName: Въведете името на референтния документ, където може да бъде намерена друга подходяща информация.

TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113c: Measures of this type implemented in previous cycle but new measures and/or significant changes planned
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113d: There are safeguard zones but there will be significant changes to them implemented as a result of this RBMP
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113eThreshold: Small abstractions do not require permits but are all registered
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113eImpoundment: Yes, there is a concession, authorisation and/or permitting regime to control water impoundment and a register of impoundments
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113f: Measures of this type implemented in previous cycle but new measures and/or significant changes planned
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113gThreshold: Yes, small discharges are exempted from controls
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113hRules: Yes, but rules apply only in Nitrate Vulnerable Zones.
TargetedQ.basicMeasuresArt113j: Some direct discharges are authorised in accordance with Article 11.3.j
TargetedQ.waterReUseMeasureImplemented: Implementation of some measures has started but no measures finished
TargetedQ.ecologicalFlow: Partly, ecological flows have been derived for some relevant water bodies but the work is still on-going

dcMetadata.wfd:title: PoM_2018_prefilled_BG1000
dcMetadata.wfd:description: Reporting guidance on "Implementation of planned Programme of Measures" (2018) according to Article 15 (3) of the Water Framework Directive
